system.Name: AutoInAPI
system.Description: AutoIn API receives bank entries posted by Banking Robots or human, and passes items to BankImportAPI.

system.Name: MAS
system.Description: Merchant Administration System (MAS) allows customers to view and manage their virtual currency accounts.  Customers can also convert their credits to any currency, and transfer to any bank account in the world.

system.Name: MerchantAPI
system.Description: Merchant API is the only public API offered by WPAP. Customers integrate with MechantAPI for a seamless integration.
system.Functionality: * APM transaction,Bank-out transactions,Bank details templates,WP bank details,Refunds

system.Name: OneClick
system.Description: OneClick integrates with 3rd party payment method  (e.g. iDeal or Alipay) to receive money from shoppers.

system.Name: TM
system.Description: Treasury Management provides a platform for Worldpay users to manage products configuration, manage WP currency accounts, on-boarding customers, and process bank-out batches.
system.Functionality: * Bank-out management,Report management,Invoice management,APM settings,Bank settings,Schedule jobs,Merchant configuration

system.Name: BankImportAPI
system.Description: BankImportAPI processes bank account entries passed by AutoInAPI  and stores entries into EPACS database.

system.Name: EPACSAPI
system.Description: EPACS API is the core API of WPAP. It accommodates most of business logic and save records into EPACS database.

system.Name: MISAPI
system.Description: MISAPI connects EPACS MIS database and generates offline reports for internal and external users.

system.Name: InvoiceAPI
system.Description: Invoice API retrieves Invoice and passes records to TM for users to download invoices.

system.Name: OneClickAPI
system.Description: OneClick API is mainly used by OneClick to retrieve and save records into EPACS database.

system.Name: PaymentMehtodAPI
system.Description: PaymentMethodAPI is designed to manage any country and currency combination offered by APMs.

system.Name: AlertingManager
system.Description: AlertingManager was created as a product that would aggregate transaction data for the purpose of creating on-the-fly business intelligence driven alerting.

system.Name: AutoInsManager
system.Description: AutoInsManager searches for a unique reference, identifies the transaction owner, and move funds to the right account.

system.Name: EPACSManager
system.Description: EPACS Manager sends user registration emails.

system.Name: ExecutionManager
system.Description: ExecutionManager creates account movements and generate events (e.g. Notification event)
system.Design conerns: Single point of failure,  this is a single thread process. There is a strong dependency between this app and half of AP apps.
system.Functionality: Creates account movements, Generates events (e.g. notification, pay-out)

system.Name: FilePickupAgent
system.Description: The File Pickup Agent is a Windows Service which implements the transfer of files through the concept of a “watcher”. A watcher is set up to poll a source location for new files on a configurable time interval. Multiple “watchers” can be set up in the File Pickup Agent, each with different configuration settings.
system.Functionality: Moves files from A to B

system.Name: MISReportsManager
system.Description: MISReprotsManager create offline reports for internal and external users.

system.Name: NotificationManager
system.Description: NotificationsManager is a process that polls for notifications (in the DB) to be sent out to merchants
system.Design conerns: Single thread, Cannot have two notification mangers running at the same time

system.Name: OneClickManager
system.Description: OneClick Manager check transactions status with APMs.
system.Design conerns: Mixed features and multiple thread continuously polling data from DB
system.Functionality: Checks transaction status with APMs, Downloads APM reconciliation reports, Downloads APM reconciliation reports

system.Name: PayoutManager
system.Description: Payout Manager validates bank-out times (what??), finds bank-out route, and generate bank files.
system.Design conerns: Single thread, multiple features are put inside this app
system.Functionality: Validate pay-out items, Check merchant liquidity funds, Block pay-out items, Find best pay-out routes, Generate bank files

system.Name: RealtimePayoutManager
system.Description: The component is used for the realtime payouts such as refunds or payouts that require realtime processing. A refund is a reversal of a successful transaction, processed by our system. Every refund has to interact with an APM API in order to perform the refund/payout and afterwards to update our system records. The RealTimePayoutManager component is the one responsible for the APM integration in this context. The payout process is complex flow within our platform, several components interact in order to achieve this such as: RefundsManager, PayoutManager, ExecutionManager, RealTimePayoutManager, MAS. These components will not be detailed here, instead the flow will be presented with emphasis on the RealTimePayoutManager.

system.Name: RefundsManager
system.Description: RefundsManager is an agent that is used to validate refund requests performed via the MerchantAPI. Refunds perfomed from MAS do reach RefundsManager. The component validates the refund request based on multiple rules such as: has a corresponding statement item, has not already been refunded, the corresponding payment type is within the allowed types and so on. Along with the validations the component can delay the processing of the refund. On top of these features, the component prepares the corresponding payout for processing. Further down the line, the created item is then picked up by PayoutManager for processing. This component does not interact with the APM, and at the point the refund reaches the RefundsManager, no transaction has been created.

system.Name: TransmissionBroker
system.Description: The Transmission Broker is a generic process for handling the processing of any file type and is not specifically designed for Bankouts
system.Functionality: Process pay-out request files via SFTP, Process Barclay account statement for corporate funding
